de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram

Interface Histogram

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DoubleHistogram, FloatHistogram, IntHistogram, LongHistogram, ObjHistogram<T>, ShortHistogram
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractObjDynamicHistogram, AbstractObjStaticHistogram, AbstractStaticHistogram, DoubleArrayStaticHistogram, DoubleDynamicHistogram, DoubleStaticHistogram, FloatDynamicHistogram, FloatStaticHistogram, IntArrayStaticHistogram, IntDynamicHistogram, IntStaticHistogram, LongArrayStaticHistogram, LongDynamicHistogram, LongStaticHistogram, MeanVarianceStaticHistogram, ShortDynamicHistogram, ShortStaticHistogram

    public interface Histogram
    Abstract API for histograms. Without specific type information, to allow this to be shared for primitive types, too!

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Histogram.Iter
      Array iterator.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CACHE_SHIFT
      This parameter controls the cache size used for dynamic histograms before setting the initial thresholds.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getBinsize()
      Get the size (width) of a bin.
      double getCoverMaximum()
      Get maximum (covered by bins, not data!)
      double getCoverMinimum()
      Get minimum (covered by bins, not data!)
      int getNumBins()
      Get the number of bins actually in use.
      Histogram.Iter iter()
      Get an iterator over all histogram bins.
